metachat.tl.communication_responseGenes_keggEnrich

metachat.tl.communication_responseGenes_keggEnrich(gene_list=None, gene_sets='KEGG_2021_Human', organism='Human')[source]

Function for performing KEGG enrichment analysis on a given list of response genes.

Parameters:

  • gene_list (Optional[list]) – A list of genes to be analyzed for enrichment. Default is None.

  • gene_sets (str) – The gene set database to use for enrichment analysis. Default is “KEGG_2021_Human”. For mouse, use ‘KEGG_2019_Mouse’.

  • organism (str) – The organism for which the gene sets are defined. Default is “Human”. For mouse, use ‘Mouse’.

Returns:

df_result – A DataFrame containing the results of the enrichment analysis.

Return type:

pandas.DataFrame
